message_1:
Identify the functional group and name the compound shown below:

![Heterocyclic compound](https://i.imgur.com/ONOE8Lf.png)
message_2:
The compound shown in the image is a heterocyclic compound containing a nitrogen atom in the ring. The functional group present in this compound is an amine group (-NH2) attached to the ring.

The compound can be named as 3-aminopyridine, where the nitrogen-containing ring is called pyridine and the amine group is at the 3rd position.
